ðŸ“– Summary: Monolith is a CLI tool and library that saves complete web pages as single, self-contained HTML files. It embeds all CSS, image, and JavaScript assets directly into the HTML, allowing for offline viewing and easy sharing. This eliminates broken links and ensures the page renders correctly even without an internet connection.
